attributes.additional_details:
Make the road outside the school safe by implementing traffic calming measures 20mph. I have contacted the council in November 2020 as a van collided with the railings outside of the school.  Since then railings on both sides have been hit and also vehicles are using the 
opposite side of road to reach traffic lights for turning right.
attributes.background: Make the road safer for school children and pedestrians in the road areas of Goffs Churchgate Academy Cheshunt Herts.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://democracy.hertfordshire.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Review speed limits outside all places of education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559842
